definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[סמם]] (√ of foll.; meaning dub.; if akin to Ar. 4am=un smell Lane:1593, ma4muwmun any fragrant plant Id:1594, then [[ס]] must be for [[שׂ]]; in that case ´[[ס]] perh. loan-word in Heb.; NH id., spice, drug (Ecclus ´[[שׂ]] Sir 38:4 m.), Aram. [[סַמָּא]] id.; samo0 drug, pigment; Ar. sam=un poison is appar. loan-word Frä:262).
